titles.title: A bill for the relief of land grantors in Henderson, Union, and Webster Counties, Kentucky, and their heirs.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S15235-15236)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.

bill.summary: 11/30/1994--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay a sum to be specified in full satisfaction of all claims by certain individuals (or their heirs) who were the former owners of properties in Henderson, Union, and Webster Counties, Kentucky, which were condemned or otherwise procured by the Government to provide for a military training camp.
